item.description:
Time: 6-8pm

Cost: $40  

This class will help you to use your innate psychic ability to read plants and flowers. I have been reading for over ten years and still remember the first time this powerful modality was presented to me. I took to it right away as have my students! Plants absorb and hold energy very quickly, because they are a living entity. It is a privilege to present this exciting form of reading to you.

 

What others are saying:

Desiree-

"It's a fun and interesting way to do a reading. J.D. is a great teacher and gives in-depth explanations. I was surprised at how much you can pick up from a flower. If you’re looking to explore different modes this is a class to attend."
item.name: The Art of Reading Flowers and Plants
